Big Little M

Custom Web Design

About

ABOUT US

Big Little M is a boutique web studio for artists, bloggers, and small businesses. We create beautiful, unique and user-friendly websites tailored to your specific needs.

We will work with you to determine how to best showcase your concept through fresh design, mobile-friendly layout, and crisp copy. Our sites are custom-made and SEO-friendly, with responsive layouts so they look good on any device. We also offer WordPress integration, so you can update your own content quickly and easily. We will work with you to determine which plugins, if any, are necessary for your site.

We keep a small roster of clients so we can be available and responsive to all your questions and concerns throughout the development process. Big Little M is located in the Washington, D.C. area. To get started with your website, email us at design@biglittlem.com.
